name: Vegan Pot Pie
description: A comfort food classic, made vegan! Vegan Pot Pie is ready in about an hour, and makes a delicious main dish for any holiday. I suggest making the pie crusts ahead of time, or use store bought vegan pie crusts to make this even easier!
recipeIngredient: Double Recipe Easy Vegan Pie Crust
3 cups frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, green beans, peas)
1 large  russet potato, chopped into small chunks
8 ounces vegan "chicken" or baked tofu, cut into chunks, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

itemListElement.text: Make a double recipe of Easy Vegan Pie Crust. Split the dough in half.
itemListElement.name: Make a double recipe of Easy Vegan Pie Crust. Split the dough in half.

itemListElement.text: Transfer half the pie crust dough to a 9-inch pie pan. Push it evenly into the pan, trim off any excess, and place in the fridge to cool while you make the filling.
itemListElement.name: Transfer half the pie crust dough to a 9-inch pie pan. Push it evenly into the pan, trim off any excess, and place in the fridge to cool while you make the filling.

itemListElement.text: Wrap the other ball of pie crust dough in plastic wrap and chill in the fridge as well.
itemListElement.name: Wrap the other ball of pie crust dough in plastic wrap and chill in the fridge as well.

itemListElement.text: Heat the olive oil over medium-high heat in a large skillet. Add the onions and garlic and saute until onion is translucent, 1-2 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Heat the olive oil over medium-high heat in a large skillet. Add the onions and garlic and saute until onion is translucent, 1-2 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Whisk in the flour, vegetable broth and unsweetened almond milk. Then add the mixed vegetables, potato and vegan chicken or tofu, if using. Simmer for 5-10 minutes, until the sauce thickens.
itemListElement.name: Whisk in the flour, vegetable broth and unsweetened almond milk. Then add the mixed vegetables, potato and vegan chicken or tofu, if using. Simmer for 5-10 minutes, until the sauce thickens.

itemListElement.text: Pour the filling into the pie crust lined pan. Roll out the other pie crust on a lightly floured surface, and carefully cover the pie with it. Trim any overhang, and seal the edges with a fork or your fingers. Cut a few slits in the middle of the top crust.
itemListElement.name: Pour the filling into the pie crust lined pan. Roll out the other pie crust on a lightly floured surface, and carefully cover the pie with it. Trim any overhang, and seal the edges with a fork or your fingers. Cut a few slits in the middle of the top crust.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 45 minutes, until the crust is golden brown. Cut, serve and enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Bake for 45 minutes, until the crust is golden brown. Cut, serve and enjoy!
